Translations.Text: Ni kre human est agx kot potter's clay
As por jinns ni kre them antaux ke, blazing fajr
Your Lord dir al angxel mi kre human est agx kot potter's clay
Once mi perfekt him blov him el My spirit vi fal prostrate antaux him
angxel fal prostrate all da them
Li dir O Iblis (Satan) why est vi ne prostrators
Li dir mi ne est prostrate human est Vi kre agx kot potter's clay
Li dir Do vi get vi banished
Vi incurred My condemnation Tag Judgment
Li dir My Lord respite me tag ili resurrected
Li dir My Lord ekde Vi hav willed ke mi ir astray mi surely entice them ter; mi send them all astray
those among Your worshipers devoted absolutely Vi sol
Li dir This est legx est inviolable
Vi ne hav potenc My servants! Vi nur hav potenc strayers sekv vi
Gxi hav 7 gates Each gate get specif akci de them
